<<<<<<< HEAD
The ladies priviledge As it was acted with good allowance at the Cock-pit in Drury-lane, and before their Majesties at White-Hall twice. By their Maiesties Servants. The author Henry Glapthorne. Glapthorne, Henry.
[68] p.
By I. Okes, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shops in Kings-street, at the signe of the Goat, and in Westminster-hall, Imprinted at London : 1640.
In verse. Signatures: A-H⁴ J² . Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
